Package io.micronaut.configuration.metrics.binder.web

Class WebMetricsPublisher<T extends io.micronaut.http.HttpResponse<?>>

java.lang.Object
reactor.core.publisher.Flux<T>
io.micronaut.configuration.metrics.binder.web.WebMetricsPublisher<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The response type
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.reactivestreams.Publisher<T>, reactor.core.CorePublisher<T>
public class WebMetricsPublisher<T extends io.micronaut.http.HttpResponse<?>> extends reactor.core.publisher.Flux<T>
Deals with the web filter metrics for success and error conditions.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Christian Oestreich, graemerocher
